Class SynthComboBoxUI.EditorFocusHandler

  • java.lang.Object

    SynthComboBoxUI

    private static class SynthComboBoxUI.EditorFocusHandler
extends Object
implements FocusListener, PropertyChangeListener
    Handler for repainting combo when editor component gains/looses focus
